page.title: 14Activities in King's Sutton
page.content: There are activities in the village for all ages. These are some of the groups which meet regularly: Over 6O's Club Gemini Club for the disabled Bridge Club Sports Clubs - tennis, soccer and cricket in season Pre-school Playgroup Mothers and Toddlers Group Girls' Brigade and Boys' Brigade Cubs, Brownies and Guides and Youth Club. There are four different churches: Anglican, Roman Catholic, Baptist and Methodist. Many villagers enjoy the wide range of Adult Education classes too.
